name: I Wish My Brain Would Just Do What It's Told
name_original: I Wish My Brain Would Just Do What It's Told
description:
I Wish My Brain Would Just Do What It's Told is a game developed by 2headedpigeon. It came out on 26-10-2022.
I Wish My Brain Would Just Do What It's Told is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
